definition: round/lump/ball/to roll into a ball/to gather/regiment/group/society/classifier for a lump or a soft mass: wad (of paper), ball (of wool), cloud (of smoke)
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
the Communist Youth League, abbr. for 共產主義青年團|共产主义青年团[Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2]

sentences.english: Of course it's the bride's sister group.
sentences.chinese: 當然是新娘子的姐妹團嘍。

sentences.english: Kneading dough by hand until the non-stick hand up.
sentences.chinese: 用手揉麪團，直到不粘手爲止。

sentences.english: Today that a panel of arbitrators has decided in favor of our company.
sentences.chinese: 今天仲裁團做出了有利於我們公司的裁決。

sentences.english: A lot of expeditions stock up on that before they go.
sentences.chinese: 不少遠征團出發前，都備好大量肯達爾薄荷餅。

sentences.english: It was due to energy or charge transfer within the clusters.
sentences.chinese: 它起因於分子團內部的能量或電荷轉移。

sentences.english: What is the percentage of scouts to the total members of the four uniform teams?
sentences.chinese: 童軍的人數佔這四個制服團體總人數的幾分之幾？

sentences.english: Strictly prohibit landlords and rich peasants from sneaking into the peasant associations and poor peasant leagues.
sentences.chinese: 嚴禁地主富農分子混入農民協會和貧農團。

sentences.english: There is a positive correlativity of the content of wet gluten and stable time of dough to the yield.
sentences.chinese: 溼麪筋含量和麪團穩定時間與強筋小麥產量呈正相關。

sentences.english: The old woman slumped in the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 那個老婦人團坐在沙發上。

sentences.english: Exactly what kind of hunting group met from so kill things?
sentences.chinese: 到底狩獵團遇到了什麼樣的事引來如此殺身之禍？

sentences.english: Then, when we arrived to the front line , it turned out to be a Katiusha regiment.
sentences.chinese: 然後，當我們到達前線時，發現這是個“喀秋莎”團。

sentences.english: The C college of Cardinals elects and advises the Pope.
sentences.chinese: 紅衣主教團選舉教皇併爲其諮詢。

sentences.english: Others have wondered if Groupon is growing too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 而其他人也懷疑團寶網的發展腳步是否太快了。

sentences.english: I play judge, jury, convict and victim.
sentences.chinese: 我扮演着法官，陪同審判團，罪犯和遭到殺害者。

sentences.english: Well, I plan on joining the wind ensemble in the spring.
sentences.chinese: 我準備春天參加管樂合奏團。

sentences.english: The PNA molecules can routinely be labeled with biotin or various fluorophores.
sentences.chinese: PNA分子可被生物素和各種熒光團常規標記。

definition: to exercise/to move about/to operate/to use connections (personal influence)/loose/shaky/active/movable/activity/campaign/maneuver/behavior/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
